name: Operation Blacksmith: Lazarus Group Campaign
description: Mapping for Lazarus Group's Operation Blacksmith

techniques.comment: Initial access was achieved using CVE-2021-44228, also known as Log4Shell, to exploit publicly exposed servers.
The threat actors used commands and scripts (like PowerShell and BAT) for various operations.
Commands like 'whoami', 'ver', 'getmac' were used for system information discovery.
Used Telegram bots and channels for command and control communication.
Used NineRAT to set up persistence by creating a service using a BAT script.
After NineRAT is installed and executed, its dropper deletes itself to evade detection.
NineRAT is used to collect data from the local system.
